name: Sahil Shindgikar
summary: Aspiring Software Development Engineer with hands-on projects in Python, Java, C++, AI/ML and cloud. Experienced in building orchestration agents, CNNs, and LLM applications.
work_auth: Eligible in UK; open to remote EU

experience.description: Gained industry exposure in AI automation, cloud architecture, and ML. Utilized Agile workflows for team collaboration and software development.

projects.Name: ResumeGenie
projects.Point1: Architected an AI job aggregator using IBM watsonx Orchestrate, Granite 3.0, and PostgreSQL
projects.Point2: Managed API/RSS parsing and normalized disparate job descriptions to prevent duplicates

projects.Name: GDC
projects.Point1: Team lead for Global Design Challenge with Engineers Without Borders UK
projects.Point2: Designed award-winning renewable energy solution based on regenerative economy principles

projects.Name: FaceAlign
projects.Point1: Developed an ML-based facial alignment system using CNNs and Ridge regression in PyTorch
projects.Point2: Predicted facial landmarks and compared deep learning vs. classical ML performance

projects.Name: SpamDetect
projects.Point1: Executed end-to-end AI pipeline for SMS Spam Detection including cleaning and training
projects.Point2: Demonstrated proficiency in text pre-processing and model performance evaluation

projects.Name: ASL-CNN
projects.Point1: Trained a CNN model for American Sign Language (ASL) detection on finger-spelling datasets
projects.Point2: analyzed complex time-series data to interpret sequential data structures

projects.Name: PlannerApp
projects.Point1: Engineered a Goal Planner application utilizing a Large Language Model (LLM)
projects.Point2: Ensured AI reasoning accuracy through specific prompt engineering
